title: Diddy is living his best Halloween life while riding a red tractor
text:
Diddy looked like he was having the time of his life at a pumpkin patch with his kids (Picture: MEGA)

Diddy was spotted getting ready for Halloween while riding a bright red tractor through a pumpkin patch with his children.

The rapper basically blended in with the tractor in his (equally as bright) red tracksuit.

He took three of his six kids to Underwood Family Farms in the countryside of Los Angeles to pick pumpkins and pet animals like the good dad he is.

Not only did they pet animals and ride tractors, the family also feasted on freshly harvested corn.

A picture of the 49-year-old seasoning his freshly harvested corn while wearing a tracksuit and sunglasses is a picture we never thought we’d have to describe yet here we are.

Diddy, real name Sean Combs, got into the spirit of pumpkin patches and now we wish the tradition was as big in the UK.

The record producer was seen carrying a huge and heavy one off the patch.

They see him rollin’, they hatin’ (Picture: Marksman/ Snorlax/BListers/ MEGA)

Diddy went ham on the seasoning (Picture: Marksman/ Snorlax/BListers/ MEGA TheMegaAgency.com)

He must have found ‘the one’.

Diddy brought along Christian, 21, and twins D’Lila Star and Jessie James, 13, who he shared his late long-time love, Kimberly Porter.

The twins matched with white T-shirts plus farm-appropriate red and black plaid shirts and blue jeans.

They really got the theme covered.

The P in P Diddy stands for pumpkin (Picture: Marksman/ Snorlax/BListers/ MEGA)

Diddy also shares Justin, 26, with first wife, designer Misa Hylton-Brim, and daughter Chance, 13, with ex-girlfriend Sara Chapman.

He had also adopted Kimberly’s son Quincy, 28.

When Kimberly suddenly passed away of pneumonia in November, the Tell Me rapper said he ‘jumped into mummy mode’.

He had told Essence magazine he’s no longer a ‘part-time father’, saying: ‘My kids come before anything else in my life.’

The mogul later added: ‘Mother’s Day is going to hurt. We definitely are going to celebrate all the mothers.

‘We’re not going to get in the way of that.’

The couple split over 11 years ago but continued to co-parent their three children – Jessie, D’Lila, and Christian – as ‘close friends’.
